binding.translation[1].definitions[1].de: material sewn or stuck along the edge of a piece of cloth for strength or decoration
binding.translation[2].definitions[0].de: a promise, agreement etc that must be kept
binding.translation[2].definitions[0].ex: Participants in the world trade talks have agreed to negotiate specific binding commitments.
a legally binding agreement between the parties
No addition to these terms is binding on the buyer unless agreed in writing.
